main event: A USAF pilot observed an object resembling a large star or planet, which moved stationarily at an altitude of 3000 feet on January 7, 1948, in Columbus, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as having a stationary appearance., The incident occurred at a significant altitude of 3000 feet., The sighting involved one other witness., The object was compared to a large star or planet in shape., The aircraft type reported was 1953 estimated.
sighted object: an object resembling a large star or planet
witness description: USAF pilot and one other witness
